text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
I see…… 
Cesario seems to have quite a grand dream.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
And you've been thinking constantly about that Cesario. 
No wonder you seem desperate.
choice_data_list: ……and so, what do you think?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Really, it was the right decision to ask me. 
If it's someone like me, then I can understand 
Cesario's goals for the future and her determination.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Two people with different values being able to understand 
each other, it's quite the difficult hurdle. I can understand 
why she's being careful about selecting a trainer, too.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Based on that, if I were to give my honest opinion…… 
『What's there to be hesitant about?』 probably sums it up.
choice_data_list: Eh?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
You want to help Cesario to realize her dream, right? 
Then can't you just support her? As a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
If it's someone as invested in it as you, then 
you're probably already well qualified. Why not 
just tell Cesario everything you feel about that?
choice_data_list: Will that really be enough for Cesario……?

text_block_list.name: Mid-rank Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Cesario-san, let me scout you! If it's the Tiara rotation, 
I have experience. I won't make you regret it!

So many trainers were trying their best to be acknowledged by her. 
But, even the experienced veterans haven't been able to do that.

I need to understand Cesario more. 
So that I can become that 『Partner』 that she's seeking.

Her talent is real. Anyone who runs in the Twinkle Series 
will have Cesario's name carved in to their memory.

Even if I'm able to help her with that, what 
happens next? When she retires, will the contract 
just end? I don't want to just watch from afar……!
choice_data_list: I want to support her future too!
I want to support her future too!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
That's right. Just wanting to support her in 
to the future is the bare minimum requirement.

As soon as she said that, I was stunned. That's 
right, the future! Wanting to support Cesario 
all throughout her future is what's important.

Then, there was only one thing left to do. 
I was already prepared to give it my all.
choice_data_list: ……I need to go to Cesario

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text:
Looks like you finally have your answer. I just saw Cesario heading 
towards the dorm. Hurry, there isn't much time until curfew.

I thank Air Groove and then hurry to the front of the Academy 
dorms. I saw that Cesario was just about to enter the building.
choice_data_list: Wait, Cesario!
Wait, Cesario!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Trainer……! What's wrong? Why are you in such a hurry?
choice_data_list: I know what kind of 『Partner』 you're looking for
I know what kind of 『Partner』 you're looking for

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Ehh.
choice_data_list: That's why I want to form a contract
That's why I want to form a contract

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……is that so? Then, I'll hear you out. 
The answer you've arrived at, just what kind of 『Partner』 is it?

I took a deep breath to calm myself. It was simple. I just needed 
to tell her what I had realized while talking to Air Groove.
choice_data_list: First, we'll win the Triple Tiara
First, we'll win the Triple Tiara

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……and then?
choice_data_list: Even after retirement, I'll support your dream
Even after retirement, I'll support your dream

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……? What does that mean?
choice_data_list: The girls you raise, I'll help them win
The girls you raise, I'll help them win

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: …………what did you just say?

It was probably an unexpected offer. 
So I needed to explain it more clearly――

That time during the Selection race, she ran like 
the wind right before the goal. I want to prove to 
the world that she's the real thing. As a trainer.

And someday, when she retires and has a student of her 
own, then at that time, I will do my best to make 
Cesario a 『Teacher』 whose name will be left in history.

Right, that was the whole point. Once Cesario 
retires, she'll use her knowledge and what 
she's learned to help the next girl succeed.

Of course, the next girl would be the one that was 
Cesario's student. Her evaluation as a 『Teacher』 
would be determined by her students' performance.

Therefore, she would need a skilled 『Trainer』 to 
help her students. The trainer that helped the famous 
athlete, Cesario, would be the natural choice.

Raise one, help her win, raise another, and help her 
win too――and the cycle would continue. In that way, 
she would truly grow to become a 『Guiding Light』

In that way, the name of a queen, of Cesario, would 
be carved in to that history, passed down from generation 
to generation……I want to be beside her even then!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ………………To think you'd empathize with me to that degree……
choice_data_list: You want to connect to the future, right?
You want to connect to the future, right?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……those words, once more, no, 
I want to hear them again and again.
choice_data_list: If you're spending a lifetime, then I am too
If you're spending a lifetime, then I am too

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: …………Really? Are you sure? For me.

Rather than be restricted to inaction by common sense, 
I would prefer to be thought a fool. I was already prepared……!
choice_data_list: Let's be that 『Guiding Light』 together!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes, yes……! Likewise! 
I'm looking forward to it, Trainer!

Before I realized it, I had held out my hand, and 
Cesario had taken it. I could feel my heart soaring.

text_block_list.name: Returning Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: What's that? Practicing for a play? In this place?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Um, Trainer……we're really standing out it seems.
choice_data_list: Ah…………! S-sorry!

text_block_list.text:
I let go of Cesario's hand and take one step back. 
I apologized to Cesario for getting too excited.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I don't mind. I kind of felt like a heroine from a story, 
so I was a little excited. It almost feels like I'm dreaming……

It was past curfew so we decided to part ways. The next day, 
I called Cesario to the trainers' room and drew up a contract.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: ……so this means our contract has been formalized, doesn't it?
choice_data_list: Looking forward to it, Cesario
Looking forward to it, Cesario

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Likewise. ……it's a mysterious feeling. With just this one 
piece of paper, we're not just a student and trainer anymore……
choice_data_list: Shall we confirm the current plan?
Shall we confirm the current plan?

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
……Yes. Generally speaking, it seems that most Uma Musume in 
the Tiara rotation tend to train their juniors one-on-one.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
That's exactly it――the type of 『Teacher』 I've been 
aiming for. By making great achievements on the 
Tiara rotation, I'll prove my abilities as a leader.
choice_data_list: So achieving the Triple Tiara then
So achieving the Triple Tiara then

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yes. However, achieving that won't be simple. 
Trainer, you saw it with your own eyes too.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Rhein Kraft, Air Messiah-san, Daring Heart-san――the girls I ran the 
Selection race with, they are also challenging the Tiara rotation.

I had heard that from other trainers. A high barrier 
stood in our way. It was almost like she was being 
tested to see if she truly could be a 『Guiding Light』

But there was no reason to be afraid. The run 
that Cesario had inherited from her 『Teacher』, 
she just had to properly use it during her races.
choice_data_list: I'll help you get the Tiara!
I'll help you get the Tiara!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: Yes. For these first 3 years, I'm looking forward to it.

And so, with this shared feeling, the drama 
reached its finale. However, Cesario's story 
had just begun. And now, let the curtain rise!
